* The history of Part B MONTHLY premiums in then-year dollars
* From Table 1 in CRS RL32582 Sept 14, 2004 and Google for 2005-2009
* 2010 numbers from CMS product number 11444
* 2011+ numbers are synthetically smoothed to match simulated values in 2020
1966  3.00
1967  3.00
1968  4.00
1969  4.00
1970  5.30
1971  5.60
1972  5.80
1973  6.30
1974  6.70
1975  6.70
1976  7.20
1977  7.70
1978  8.20
1979  8.70
1980  9.60
1981  11.00
1982  12.20
1983  12.20
1984  14.60
1985  15.50
1986  15.50
1987  17.90
1988  24.80
1989  31.90
1990  28.60
1991  29.90
1992  31.80
1993  36.60
1994  41.10
1995  46.10
1996  42.50
1997  43.80
1998  43.80
1999  45.50
2000  45.50
2001  50.00
2002  54.00
2003  58.70
2004  66.60
2005  78.20
2006  88.50
2007  93.50
2008  96.40
2009  96.40
2010  110.50
